meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>big</kanji> <kanji>rule</kanji> over a <kanji>territory</kanji>, you're probably a pretty great leader. A <vocabulary>president</vocabulary>, perhaps?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well
